verses.name: Revelation 1:13
verses.text: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.

verses.name: Revelation 1:14
verses.text: His head and his hairs were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;

verses.name: Revelation 1:15
verses.text: And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.
